div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1833 Taxila, Punjab, Pakistan, 1884 (1068) Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 143 AE (square) Pantaleon: 9 Agathocles: 15 India (uniface and two face): 111 Unc.: 8 Disposition: unknown Cunningham, Coins of Ancient India (London, 1891), pp. 65-6
